content: पाठः [पठ्-भावे घञ्] {@--1@} Reciting recitation, repeating. {@--2@} Reading, perusal, study. {@--3@} Studying or reciting the Vedas (ब्रह्मयज्ञ), one of the five daily Yajñas or sacrifices to be performed by Brāhmaṇas {@--4@} The text of a book, a reading. variant; अत्र गंधवद्गंधमादनं इति आगंतुकः पाठः . प्राचीनपाठस्तु सुगंधिर्गंधमादनः इति पुल्लिंगांतः <ls>Malli.</ls> on <ls>Ku. 6. 46.</ls>
